short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and update SharePoint Online/SP2013/SP2016/SP2019 css/js files, inject files to web, manage web/list properties, list Webhook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome Extension for creating and updating files (js, css), injecting files to sites, modifying web/list propertybag values (add, edit, remove, index) and creating webhook subscriptions, edit/add/remove webparts from publishing pages and run sp-pnp-js typescript snippets in SP2013, SP2016, SP2019 and SharePoint Online from Chrome Developer Tools. This tool will help you create amazing SharePoint applications fast from your browser from any computer which runs Chrome!
